block_comment: This block of code is for a stepped counter with an incrementing compare value and phase update. On every positive edge of input clock, it checks if the counter 'r_step_count' reached its predefined step limit (STEP - 1). If it has, it resets 'r_step_count' and checks if the compare register 'r_compare' is at value 9'h100 (256 in decimal). If it is, it resets 'r_compare' and increments 'r_phase'. Otherwise, it increments 'r_compare'. If 'r_step_count' hasn't reached its step limit, it simply increments 'r_step_count'.
